name: Sphere Adventure
description:
MAP EDITOR WORK BAD!

Short information

It is simple adventure game for exam. So we decided to post this game here special for itch.io. Here you must find three campsides and all the chests.  

Objects
  • Press "F" to sit on chair;
  • Press "F" to pick up weapon and press "R" to drop;
Control

W,A,S,D or ←, ↑, →, ↓ - movements;

Space - jump;

R,F - use key;

OUR WEBSITE Notes

There are lots of bugs we know))

If you like our game rate it or write some comments it will support us)
